
## FRONT-END TECHNICAL TEST

#### The following project was developed based on the requirement of recording results consuming an api already designed in which results were managed, the respective mandatory fields were stipulated to send requests from the frontend to the backend and the respective consumption of the api with a JWT security.

## Features

- **Register:** Record student results with the respective test and test questions.
- **Advanced search:** Search the tests that the student has submitted, filter the questions of the test that the student submitted and compare if these are correct

## Requirements

1. Node.js
2. npm

## Technologies used

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install
```

```bash
$ npm start
```
